title: Mandrill - The Collection
description:
Music : Soul : MP3/192Kbps
Way back in the 70&#039;s. we had Earth, Wind & Fire - War - Santana, And then we had MANDRILL! This group of Soul & Latino brothers, made music just as good as any others. I still listen to them today. Here is my collection of Mandrill&#039;s music. It took a while to find them all, but other than thier recenty Cd&#039;s, this collection I&#039;m proud to say is complete. If you&#039;re into 70&#039;s funk, then check out Mandrill. They are best know for "Symphonic Revolution & Central Park" One of my favorite is " I Refuse To Smile" from Mandrill Is. Let me know if you dig. Peace
